description: At the Apple Store, you maintain customers’ trust in Apple as the skilled expert, troubleshooting and repairing products. You use problem-solving and people skills to assure Genius Bar customers of swift resolutions to their technical problems. You also educate your team members about products, while independently keeping your own technical know-how up to date. With your customer service brilliance and empathetic nature, you provide Genius advice and support every day.  Both full-time and part-time jobs are available.
name: MX-Genius
